name: CircleCI Tool
natural_language_description: 这是 CircleCI Tool 节点。主要用于: Consume CircleCI API

descriptionType.name: descriptionType
descriptionType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tool Description | 默认值: auto
available_options: Set Automatically (值: auto) - Automatically set based on resource and operation
Set Manually (值: manual) - Manually set the description

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Consume CircleCI API | (必填项)

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: pipeline

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: get
available_options: Get Many (值: getAll) - Get many pipelines

vcs.name: vcs
vcs.natural_language_description: 参数名: Provider | 作用: Source control system

projectSlug.name: projectSlug
projectSlug.description: Project slug in the form org-name/repo-name
projectSlug.natural_language_description: 参数名: Project Slug | 作用: Project slug in the form org-name/repo-name

pipelineNumber.name: pipelineNumber
pipelineNumber.natural_language_description: 参数名: Pipeline Number | 作用: The number of the pipeline | 默认值: 1

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 100

filters.name: filters
filters.natural_language_description: 参数名: Filters | 默认值: {}
available_options: branch (值: None) - The name of a vcs branch

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: branch (值: None) - The branch where the pipeline ran. The HEAD commit on this branch was used for the pipeline. Note that branch and tag are mutually exclusive.
tag (值: None) - The tag used by the pipeline. The commit that this tag points to was used for the pipeline. Note that branch and tag are mutually exclusive
